Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: Ultrathin, defect-free, low-crystallinity layers between mesoporous nanosheets

Other Information.Additional Info: High permeance of ≈4000 GPU due to ultrathin structure and reduced tortuosity.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Strong interaction with exposed metal clusters slows down CO2 migration

Other Information.Additional Info: Enrichment of CO2 molecules in membrane nanopores further reduces its permeation rate.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion combined with strong affinity of frameworks for CO2

Other Information.Additional Info: The membrane exhibits excellent stability under varying temperature and humidity conditions due to the tightly integrated LCM inhibiting MGO swelling.
